purpose: To provide a framework for developing autonomous agents capable of complex decision-making and task execution
principle: Based on the ReAct (Reasoning and Acting) architecture, integrating large language models for decision-making
reusability: Modular design with API support for easy integration and extension, supports multi-agent systems
limitations: Still in alpha stage, may have stability issues, and lacks comprehensive documentation for all features
name: Autono
description: A ReAct-Based Highly Robust Autonomous Agent Framework
highlight: Highly robust framework for building autonomous agents using the ReAct paradigm
